Package org.apache.xerces.impl.io

Class Summary
ASCIIReader A simple ASCII byte reader.
Latin1Reader Reader for the ISO-8859-1 encoding.
UCSReader Reader for UCS-2 and UCS-4 encodings.
UTF16Reader A UTF-16 reader.
UTF8Reader A UTF-8 reader.
 

Exception Summary
MalformedByteSequenceException Signals that a malformed byte sequence was detected by a java.io.Reader that decodes bytes of a given encoding into characters.
